name: Janjagruti Bahuddeshiya Sanstha
briefDescription: Our NGO has been working from 2006.Stablish SHGs.Established near 150 SHGs in ruralYavatmal and Bhandara Districts. We prepared ID Cards of Senior Citizens through Dignity Foundation Mumbai and help to open the Govt.We arranged programm in villages for poshan aahar in primary schools.
